ta.title: புதிய ஜனநாயக முன்னணியின் தேசிய பட்டியல்
body_lines: மேலும், முன்னாள் சபாநாயகர் மஹிந்தா யபா அபேவர்தேனா யபாவின் பெயர் லவுஸை உள்ளடக்கியது

en.title: National List of New Democratic Front
body_lines: Also, the name of former Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena Yapa includes the louse

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:

National List of New Democratic Front: Political alliance formed in Sri Lanka. Includes former Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena. Controversy surrounding his name, allegedly containing "louse". Political implications and public perception of the alliance and its leaders.
